Uses of Class
com.sun.xml.ws.commons.virtualbox.IHardDisk

Uses of IHardDisk in com.sun.xml.ws.commons.virtualbox
 

Methods in com.sun.xml.ws.commons.virtualbox that return IHardDisk
 IHardDisk IVirtualBox.createHardDisk(HardDiskStorageType storageType)
          Creates a new unregistered hard disk that will use the given storage type.
 IHardDisk IVirtualBox.findHardDisk(String location)
          Returns a registered hard disk that uses the given location to store data.
 IHardDisk IMachine.getHardDisk(StorageBus bus, int channel, int device)
          Returns the hard disk attached to the given controller under the specified device number.
 IHardDisk IVirtualBox.getHardDisk(UUID id)
          Returns the registered hard disk with the given UUID.
 IHardDisk IHardDisk.getParent()
          Parent of this hard disk (a hard disk this one is directly based on).
 IHardDisk IHardDisk.getRoot()
          Root hard disk of this hard disk.
 IHardDisk IVirtualBox.openHardDisk(String location)
          Opens a hard disk from an existing location.
 IHardDisk IVirtualBox.unregisterHardDisk(UUID id)
          Unregisters a hard disk previously registered using #registerHardDisk().The specified hard disk must not be attached to any of the existing virtual machines and must not have children (differencing) hard disks.
 

Methods in com.sun.xml.ws.commons.virtualbox that return types with arguments of type IHardDisk
 List<IHardDisk> IHardDisk.getChildren()
          Children of this hard disk (all differencing hard disks for those this one is a parent).
 List<IHardDisk> IVirtualBox.getHardDisks()
          Collection of hard disk objects registered within this VirtualBox instance.
 

Methods in com.sun.xml.ws.commons.virtualbox with parameters of type IHardDisk
 void IVirtualBox.registerHardDisk(IHardDisk hardDisk)
          Registers the given hard disk within this VirtualBox installation.
